name: Operational waste - how to reduce it, how to handle it and how to reuse it
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Operational waste will have the biggest environmental impact over a development's lifecycle whether at building, neighbourhood or district level, To what extent can sustainable operational waste management be encouraged through design?

presentations.name: The solutions available to developers for managing waste from traditional bin based systems to underground and vacuum systems
presentations.speakers: Julian Gaylor, Sales & Marketing Director, Taylors Waste Converters

presentations.name: Reusing waste plastics and converting waste plastics into sustainable urban drainage systems
The problem of food waste in new and high density developments and options for management
presentations.speakers: Linda Crichton, Head of Collections & Quality, WRAP
